column1: Kata Robata////The sashimi here is comparable to seafood I've had fresh out of the ocean in Asia (literally). It's really good folks. While there's no ocean view
column2: the best seat in the house is at the sushi bar. I usually like to be seated away from people but this particular evening
column3: my boyfriend and I were seated here and I rather preferred it. I loved watching the sushi chefs make the eye-catching sashimi platters and sushi rolls but then again
column4: I've always been a fan of open kitchen concepts. The hustle and bustle of the sushi chefs really enhanced the experience
column6: they'll make sure you're well taken care of.
